reviewText: This man ( Hoggard ) is a voice crying in the wilderness. He'll tell you what the bible says even if it will cost him money ( because you won't buy anymore of his DVD's ) or give him a bad review. Every DVD I've gotten from him has had something that would  offend someone. So will this one. It's about various mergings going on in the world today. This will include gays and transsexuals. It's not just about that - but it does include sex , sex roles and so on. It will offend some of you.
